title: The Gunsmith

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Reload.
- Once, At night, choose a player to Unload.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When You Reload Someone, If They Have Already Used Their Revolver, or Use It Tonight, Give Them an Additional Bullet for Their Revolver.
- When You Unload Someone, They Lose Any Bullets They Have and Have Their Attack Set to **None** for This Night.
- You Start With 2 Bullets.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid your county of rapscallions and varmint.

desc:
Post 5487
*You don't want to gain the ire of the man making your bullets.*
